marklogic.body:
Its a start, some way to go. Britain's housing stock is massively over-valued and there are far too many properties currently inÂ forbearance (~15% should be being repossessed but the banks are holding , time to unleash the vacant possession whirlwind on the market) .
The Government has bet deeply and recklessly and are prepared to destroy most of the rest of the economy to keep them propped up. Its incredible that with dangerously low Interest Rates (Burning through savings) and vast amounts of QE the best result they can buy with your great-grandchildren's wealth is -1%! You really have to see this in its context, +1/-1 is not 'bumping along' when you have those kind of forces at work and you're Gaining absolutely no traction.
